channel.title: ~~~Client Help~~~
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this goes here or the client help section. So sorry if its not in the right spot :rolleyes:
Anyways, I put my server up earlier today. My client was downloaded 6 times but no one came on. So i asked my friend on MSN to download it to see if it works. He tried it, and he said that my client doesn't download the cache. How do I fix this?

item.title: ~~~Client Help~~~
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

Is this Pi?
If it is I suggest checking “cachedownloader.java” look for “Dropbox” or some other link to a website and making sure that it works.
If not you will need to zip and upload the cache to dropbox and change the link.
I can help you with this tomorrow if you want.

Read full topic
